# Hands Detail Shop

## Business Overview
Hands Detail Shop is a premium mobile auto detailing service based in Arnold, PA, with 16 years of professional experience. Founded and operated by Nazir El, an Air Force veteran, the company brings military precision to automotive perfection.

## Contact Information
- **Business Name**: Hands Detail Shop
- **Phone**: (412) 947-6098
- **Website**: https://handsdetailshop.com
- **Email**: Contact form available at https://handsdetailshop.com/contact.html
- **Address**: 1532 Constitution Blvd, Arnold, PA 15068

## Business Hours
- Monday - Saturday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Sunday: By Appointment Only

## Owner & Founder
- **Name**: Nazir El
- **Title**: CEO & Master Detailer
- **Background**: Air Force Veteran with 16 years of professional auto detailing experience
- **Origin**: Originally from Baton Rouge, Louisiana; relocated to Pennsylvania after Hurricane Katrina
- **Military Service**: Served in the Air Force, worked on diesel and jet engines

## Service Area
Proudly serving the Greater Pittsburgh area including:
- Arnold, PA
- Fox Chapel
- Sewickley Heights
- Upper St. Clair
- Surrounding communities within 50-mile radius

## Services Offered

### Personal Vehicle Packages
- Essential Package ($65-85)
- Executive Package ($145-185)
- Signature Package ($285-365)
- Presidential Package ($585-785)
- Ultimate Armor ($1,285-1,685)

### Motorcycle Services
- Road Ready ($85-105)
- Chrome & Shine ($145-185)
- Show Bike ($245-295)
- Seasonal Prep ($125-155)

### Monthly Residential Plans
- Single Car Monthly ($80/month)
- Two Car Monthly ($140/month)
- Three+ Cars Monthly (custom pricing)

### Specialty Services
- Ceramic Coating ($500+)
- Paint Correction ($350+)
- Yacht & Boat Detailing
- RV & Motorhome Detailing
- Fleet Services
- Commercial Vehicle Detailing
- Tractor & Bus Detailing

## Key Features
- **Mobile Service**: We come directly to you - home, office, or any convenient location
- **Veteran-Owned**: Air Force veteran bringing military precision to every detail
- **Family-Owned**: Family-owned and operated business
- **Licensed & Insured**: Fully licensed and insured for your protection
- **16 Years Experience**: Over 5,000 vehicles detailed
- **Free Estimates**: Complimentary quotes for all services
- **Professional Grade**: Premium products and techniques
- **Customer Focused**: 5-star rated service

## Payment Options
- Cash
- Credit Card
- Debit Card
- Square payments accepted

## Special Offers
- 15% OFF for first-time customers (New Year Special)
- FREE Tire Shine with any package
- $30 Deposit secures your appointment
- Rewards program available

- Auto Detailing Service
- Mobile Detailing Provider

## Specializations
- Ceramic coating application
- Paint correction and polishing
- Interior deep cleaning and restoration
- Leather conditioning
- Marine and yacht detailing
- RV and large vehicle detailing
- Commercial fleet services
- Monthly maintenance programs

## Core Values
- Attention to detail in every service
- Military precision and professionalism
- Customer convenience through mobile service
- Quality over quantity approach
- Building long-term customer relationships
- Honest and transparent pricing
- Continuous improvement and training
